L.A.

do have

sell

Thai 
> to English very well and I would love to share some scanlations to our 
> little group.

Kurogane.

would be

>

movie 
> When the Last Sword is Drawn) is in Thai because as you know there 
is a HUGE

Nice to meet you,  Tiffany-san!

Well, I do know one place that sells manga online in Thai but I don't 
know where to find novels. The address is www.comtoon.com. Are you 
staying in Thai now? I guess not because you want to buy them online 
right? For Mibugishiden I'm sure the VCDs have already been distributed 
here since I find the review of it. I will send you the review via e-mail. 
Though I haven't watched such movie yet, I know that the story is 
focused well on Saito-san and likely to end in tragedy.

For the manga relating to Shinsengumi, I know the story `Sakamoto 
ryoma' but it contains only few chapters about Shinsengumi. I still don't 
find Kaze Hikaru. For Peace maker Kurogane here `Bonkoch Comics' has 
released the third volume already. You can buy it from comtoon. Hope 
this can help and sorry for the delay.  ^_^ 

Since I'm far less fluent in the language than you, it took me quite long 
to finish this simple reply.  ^_^' Is my English O.K. or not?

Giffy
